name: Emperor: Rise of the Middle Kingdom

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Emperor - Rise of the Middle Kingdom/Emperor.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Emperor - Rise of the Middle Kingdom/Emperor.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
